title: Shio Koji
description: Shio koji is made by combining rice koji, salt and water, then letting the mixture ferment for about a week.

directions.title: Boil water; combine
steps: Heat water in a medium saucepan to 140 degrees F
Combine rice koji, salt, and water in a heat resistant container with a lid

directions.title: Ferment
steps: Cover with the lid and let the mixture ferment at room temperature until it has thickened and smells sweet, fruity, and slightly funky, at least 7 days or up to 14 days, string once per day.

directions.title: Store
steps: Store in the refrigerator for up to 6 months
